text: The New York Dragons are an Arena Football League team. They were started in 1995 as the Iowa Barnstormers. In 2001, the team moved to New York. They now play in the Eastern Division of the National Conference. == Notable players == * Mike Furrey - OS * Aaron Garcia - QB * Billy Parker - DS * Kurt Warner - QB == Other websites == * Official Website * Iowa Barnstormers at ArenaFan.com * New York Dragons at ArenaFan.com Category:Arena Football League Category:Sports in New York (state) Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:Organizations based in New York (state)
title: New York Dragons
